participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Determined and positive, Emily inspires those around her with her resilience.
participant_1.background: i'm a cancer survivor. i love running and preparing for marathons. i got a new job just yesterday to be a life coach. i am a clean eater. my parents were both very athletic.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and lively, Jake enjoys pushing his limits and exploring new challenges.
participant_2.background: i never broke a bone in my body ever in my life. i was raised in a single parent household. i read twenty books a year. i am a stunt double as my second job.
